short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy links and page urls with text from context menu
short.uk: Копіювати посилання та URL-адреси сторінок із текстом із контекстного меню
short.zh_CN: 从上下文菜单中复制带有文本的链接和页面 URL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides an ability to edit Context Menu for links.

Context Menu is edited in the extension Options window.

In Options you can:
 - create new Context Menu item by specifying its Title and Macros
 - edit Context Menu item Title and Macros
 - delete Item

Menu Item Macros can contain {u} and {t} macros, which will be replaced by link URL and link Text respectively.

6.1.3
Add Honeybadger to track errors

6.1.1
Add Google Analytics to track errors

6.1.0
Support rich link copy again

6.0.0
Upgrade to Manifest V3. Medium redesign.
